rooms.description: Spacious living area with Scandinavian minimalist design elements.
Functional dining space integrated into the living area.
Modern kitchen with open layout for flow and natural light, featuring Vastu guidelines with east or north facing windows.
A serene master bedroom with plenty of storage space, designed with Scandinavian simplicity and adherence to Vastu principles ensuring calm energy.
Balanced bedroom for secondary occupant, maintaining a minimalist decor with functional layout.
Additional bedroom optimized for relaxation and personal space.
Dedicated home office with a functional setup that encourages productivity while being in proximity to the master bedroom as per Vastu guidelines.
Private bathroom for the master bedroom, featuring efficient fixtures and soft Scandinavian aesthetics.
Secondary bathroom for visitors and guests with a compact yet modern design.
Integrated servant quarters ensuring privacy and functionality with separate entry if necessary.

Open space on the rooftop offering a peaceful retreat with views of the sky. Designed for leisure and occasional social gatherings, featuring Scandinavian minimalist design elements with a focus on natural materials.

openings.description: Primary entrance designed to welcome energy per Vastu principles, ensuring calm ingress.
Secondary entry offering access to the rooftop terrace and servant quarters, facilitating smooth circulation.
